contents.text: Welcome to Fond in San Francisco, where we help you attract, retain, and motivate your employees.
For information about our employee rewards and recognition solutions, press 1.
To schedule a personalized product demo with our team, press 1.
Thank you for requesting a demo; please hold while we connect you with a Fond specialist.

navigationGoals: Schedule a personalized walkthrough of their employee recognition solution
I’d like to schedule a personalized demo of Fond’s employee recognition platform for our veteran support team.
Schedule a product demo to assess Fond’s rewards API endpoints and integration workflow
I’d like to book a live walkthrough of your employee reward service.
I’d like to schedule a personalized demo to explore how Fond’s recognition features could support our physics student group.

contents.text: For details on pricing plans and packages, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to our sales team for pricing information.

navigationGoals: Obtain detailed pricing information for their rewards packages
I need details on Fond’s pricing options for a small nonprofit supporting veterans.
Get a comprehensive pricing matrix for Fond’s recognition platform subscription tiers
I need to learn how much your reward program plans cost.
I need detailed pricing information on Fond’s plans and any available academic or student discounts.

contents.text: For customer support or account assistance, press 2.
For technical support with your Fond platform, press 1.
Connecting you to our support specialists; please hold.

navigationGoals: Resolve a technical issue with the Fond platform
I’m having trouble logging into my Fond account and need technical assistance.
Diagnose and resolve API authentication errors in my Fond implementation
I’m having trouble logging into my account and need technical help.
I can’t log into my Fond account and need technical assistance to access my rewards dashboard.

contents.text: For billing or invoice inquiries, press 2.
Our billing department will be with you shortly; please hold.

navigationGoals: Clarify a charge on my billing invoice
I have a question about a billing charge on my Fond invoice.
Reconcile our recent Fond billing statements and usage-based charges
I have questions about a recent bill or invoice for my account.
I’d like to review a recent Fond invoice on my department’s account and resolve a billing discrepancy.
